Package model

Interface Party

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IOParty
    public interface Party
    Represents a group of Characters that participate in a campaign. This interface contains methods for getting members of the party and damaging/healing members of a party.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void damage​(java.lang.String name, int amount)
      Reduces the hp of the Character in the party that has the given name.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of this Party.
      Character[] getParty()
      Returns all the Characters found in this Party.
      Character getPartyMember​(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the Character that has the given name (not player name).
      boolean hasCharacter​(java.lang.String name)
      Determines if there's a Character with the given name.
      void heal​(java.lang.String name, int amount)
      Adds to the hp value of a the Character in the party that has the given name.
      int size()
      Returns the number of Characters in this Party.

      • getPartyMember

        Character getPartyMember​(java.lang.String name)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns the Character that has the given name (not player name).
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the character to get
        Returns:
        the Character that has the given name.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there's no character with the given name OR if the given String is null

      • hasCharacter

        boolean hasCharacter​(java.lang.String name)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Determines if there's a Character with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the character to find
        Returns:
        true if there's a character in this party with the given name, otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • damage

        void damage​(java.lang.String name,
            int amount)
     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Reduces the hp of the Character in the party that has the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the character to damage
        amount - the amount of hp to reduce
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the amount is less than 0 OR if the given String is null

      • heal

          int amount)
   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Adds to the hp value of a the Character in the party that has the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the character to damage
        amount - the amount of hp to reduce
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the amount is less than 0 OR if the given String is null
